1.0.name: wordpress/wp-webmoney
1.0.description: IMPORTANT! PLUGIN IS NOT SUPPORTED ANYMORE! This plugin allows you get donations and accept payments from people using WebMoney system. WebMoney is the most popular payment system in Europe. iYou can show donors list and total donations amount in your blog sidebar and pages using [shortcodes]. Visit widget page for more information.
